tool_description: This is a simple API uses a deep learning network to scan images for adult content. The current implementation requires the image to be hosted via HTTP(S). Only images less than 5MB in size are valid at this time. Keywords: porn, explicit, sexual, scan.
name: isporn
title: isporn

api_list.name: Scan
api_list.description: Returns JSON detailing if image is of adult content.

required_parameters.name: img
required_parameters.description: URL of image to be scanned, must be jpg or png, image size must be less than 5MB
